content:
Redirected from https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/237824-t-lang.2Fdoc/topic/lang.20team.20review.20request/near/233780938

This PR updates the "implement our own Vec" chapter and it's highly related to the library area so I'd like to ask the libs team to review it. It looks good to me but I'd appreciate it if someone here could take a look :)
